Articles.Content:
Javascript is disabled. View full album

The opponent of the ME-262, the gloster meteor is out! Tuned to perform historically relative to the Me-262, it has a worse climb rate, lower speed, but longer range. You will need tweakscale and BDArmory for this one, with the engines on the wings. It has less guns than the real version so as to be accurate as opposed to the Me-262.

Features:

1 seat

Lightweight

Twin cannons

Good looks
